mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM Z_USER zu , Z_JOB zj, Z_RESOURCE zr WHERE zu.U_NO = zr.U_NO AND zr.P_NO = zj.P_NO AND zr.U_NO = zj.U_NO AND zj.J_COMPLETER != 1 AND zj.J_REFNO != 0 AND zr.U_NO = #{U_NO}
SELECT count(*) FROM Z_USER zu, Z_RESOURCE zr, Z_PROJECT zp WHERE zu.U_NO = zr.U_NO AND zr.P_NO = zp.P_NO AND zu.U_NO = #{U_NO}

SELECT count(*) FROM Z_USER zu, Z_RESOURCE zr, Z_JOB zj, Z_PROJECT zp, Z_OUTPUTS zo WHERE zu.U_NO = zr.U_NO AND zr.U_NO = zj.U_NO AND zr.P_NO = zp.P_NO AND zr.P_NO = zj.P_NO AND zj.J_NO = zo.J_NO AND zj.J_REFNO != 0 AND zu.U_NO = #{U_NO}
SELECT count(*) FROM Z_USER zu, Z_RESOURCE zr, Z_PROJECT zp, Z_RISK zr2 WHERE zu.U_NO = zr.U_NO AND zr.P_NO = zp.P_NO AND zp.P_NO = zr2.P_NO AND zu.U_ID = zr2.R_RECEIVE AND zu.U_NO =#{U_NO}

SELECT DISTINCT zp.P_NAME ,trunc(zp.P_ENDD)-trunc(sysdate) dDay ,zj.J_COMPLETER * 100 AS percent FROM Z_PROJECT zp, Z_USER zu , Z_RESOURCE zr , (SELECT J_COMPLETER, P_NO FROM Z_JOB zj WHERE J_REFNO = 0 ) zj WHERE zu.U_NO = zr.U_NO AND zr.P_NO = zp.P_NO AND zj.P_NO = zp.P_NO AND zj.J_COMPLETER != 1 AND zu.U_NO = #{U_NO} ORDER BY dDay

SELECT DISTINCT beforeCnt, ongoingCnt, doneCnt FROM ( SELECT count(*) beforeCnt FROM Z_JOB WHERE u_no = #{U_NO} AND j_completer = 0 AND J_REFNO!=0 ), ( SELECT count(*) ongoingCnt FROM Z_JOB WHERE u_no = #{U_NO} AND j_completer > 0 AND j_completer < 1 AND J_REFNO!=0 ), ( SELECT count(*) doneCnt FROM Z_JOB WHERE u_no = #{U_NO} AND j_completer = 1 AND J_REFNO!=0 ), Z_JOB

SELECT DISTINCT zp.P_NAME, zp.P_NO, pm.pm_name, zd.D_NAME , (CASE WHEN sysdate < zp.P_STARTD THEN '시작전' WHEN zj.J_COMPLETER = 1 THEN '완료' WHEN zj.J_COMPLETER != 1 AND SYSDATE > zp.P_ENDD THEN '지연' ELSE '진행' END) progress_state , zp.P_STARTD, zp.P_ENDD , nvl(zj.j_completer,0) * 100 AS progress_rt , nvl(zj2.job_cnt,0) AS job_cnt, nvl(zr.risk_cnt,0) AS risk_cnt FROM Z_PROJECT zp LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT a.P_NO, a.U_NO FROM Z_RESOURCE a ) zr ON zp.P_NO = zr.P_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT distinct a.U_NO, a.U_NAME FROM z_user a )zu ON zr.U_NO = zu.U_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT a.U_ID, a.U_NAME AS pm_name FROM Z_USER a ) pm ON zp.p_pm = pm.U_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN Z_DEPARTMENT zd ON zp.D_NO = zd.D_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT distinct c.P_NO, a.J_COMPLETER FROM Z_JOB a LEFT OUTER JOIN Z_PROJECT c ON a.p_no = c.p_no WHERE a.J_REFNO = 0 ) zj ON zp.p_no = zj.p_no LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT c.P_NO, COUNT(A.J_NO) AS job_cnt FROM Z_JOB A LEFT OUTER JOIN Z_PROJECT c ON A.p_no = c.p_no WHERE A.J_REFNO != 0 GROUP BY c.p_no ) zj2 on zp.p_no = zj2.p_no LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT A.P_NO , COUNT(A.R_NO) AS risk_cnt FROM Z_RISK A GROUP BY A.P_NO ) zr on zp.p_no = zr.p_no WHERE zu.U_NO = #{U_NO} order by zp.P_STARTD
